name: bedrock-data-automation
description: AWS Bedrock Data Automation project with TypeScript Lambda functions

scripts.deploy:transcription: cd deploy-bundled && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name dmg-inbound-callrecording-transcription --zip-file fileb://lambda-transcription-bundled.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:persistence: cd deploy-bundled && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name dmg-inbound-callrecording-persistence --zip-file fileb://lambda-persistence-bundled.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:retrieval: cd deploy-bundled && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name dmg-inbound-callrecording-retrieval --zip-file fileb://lambda-retrieval-bundled.zip --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:transcription && npm run deploy:persistence && npm run deploy:retrieval
